page.title: 13A MORNING AT SCHOOL
page.content:
Nine o'clock the school day starts, we rush in through the cloakroom door, change shoes and sit down by the teachers chair. We have register. We line up for assembly. When assembly is over we sit down by the teachers chair again and are told what work to do. We usually have to do maths, writing or reading. Ten twentyfive it is playtime till 10:45. At playtime we go outside. When we come in and get on with our work of physical education, art or finishing off work from before playtime. At 12 o'clock it is lunch time. Our work goes away,we sit by our teacher then she will send us off for dinner.
By Daniella Smith. Aged 11
